article_title: New Brunswick’s chief medical officer of health supports possible closure of schools - Global News
article_description: New Brunswick s chief medical officer of health supports possible closure of schools Global News Province shuts down public schools for 2 weeks over COVID 19 worries CBC ca New Brunswick to close publics schools for two weeks due to COVID 19 concerns Toronto
article_content: New Brunswick s chief medical officer of health says she supports the closure of schools in the province if an all party committee decides it is necessary to deal with the novel coronavirus pandemic Dr  Jennifer Russell  the province s chief medical officer   2002 chars
